name: Mushroom Picking (albertnez)
description:
Very short platformer, where you go mushroom picking, and thinks start getting weird.

Pick all 8 Mushrooms to win.

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump / Start: X Key.

Also supports gamepad.

Made entirely with Pico-8 in 3h for the #Trijam 127: "Things are getting weird"
